title: Introducing the Moment
description:
Wondery’s The Moment, hosted by comedian Ingrid Haas, explores some epic real life romances to find the answers to our toughest relationship questions. From a Taylor Swift intervention, to getting betrothed by a horse, this podcast is your real life Rom-Com. Listen now at wondery.fm/pat
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Starburns Audio
